actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that legislation providing for withholding of Federal income tax from dividends and interest should not be enacted.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that legislation providing for withholding of Federal income tax from dividends and interest should not be enacted.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that legislation providing for withholding of Federal income tax from dividends and interest should not be enacted.
